de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.api.profile.operations

Interface ProfileRegistrationService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProfileOperations
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl, DFSBasedProfileStorageImplRuntimeDelegatable, DFSRelativeProfileRegistrationService, ProfileRegistrationServiceImpl, ProfileRegistrationServiceImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public interface ProfileRegistrationService
    Registers user in system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createAllAllowableKeystores(UserIDAuth user, UserPrivateProfile profile)
      Creates document and optionally storage keystore and publishes his public keys according to his UserPrivateProfile
      void createDocumentKeystore(UserIDAuth user, UserPrivateProfile profile)
      Creates document keystore according to his UserPrivateProfile
      void createStorageKeystore(UserIDAuth user)
      Creates storage keystore according to his UserPrivateProfile
      void registerPrivate(CreateUserPrivateProfile profile)
      Registers private part of user profile - his keystore location, private folder location, etc.
      void registerPublic(CreateUserPublicProfile profile)
      Registers public part of user's profile - his INBOX and where are his public keys.
      void registerUsingDefaults(UserIDAuth user)
      Register user using all-default values.

    • Method Detail

      • registerPublic

        void registerPublic(CreateUserPublicProfile profile)
        Registers public part of user's profile - his INBOX and where are his public keys. IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Parameters:
        profile - Public profile part

      • registerPrivate

        void registerPrivate(CreateUserPrivateProfile profile)
        Registers private part of user profile - his keystore location, private folder location, etc. IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Parameters:
        profile - Private profile part

      • createAllAllowableKeystores

        void createAllAllowableKeystores(UserIDAuth user,
                                 UserPrivateProfile profile)
        Creates document and optionally storage keystore and publishes his public keys according to his UserPrivateProfile
        Parameters:
        user - Keystore owner
        profile - Associate profile with this keystore

      • createDocumentKeystore

        void createDocumentKeystore(UserIDAuth user,
                            UserPrivateProfile profile)
        Creates document keystore according to his UserPrivateProfile
        Parameters:
        user - Keystore owner

      • createStorageKeystore

        void createStorageKeystore(UserIDAuth user)
        Creates storage keystore according to his UserPrivateProfile
        Parameters:
        user - Keystore owner

      • registerUsingDefaults

        void registerUsingDefaults(UserIDAuth user)
        Register user using all-default values. IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Parameters:
        user - User authorization to register
